Conclusion¶

This work demonstrates how with just putting two python modules and two javascript modules together to solve the indoorGIS issue. For future works, the main challenge is to prepare the data in such a way that this work can be extended or used with little or less modifications. This project doesn’t use any Geodatabases like PostGIS or Spatialite because of the deployment platform limitations. However if the study area is more or if there are going to be more concurrent users, this app can be extended to use those kind of Geodatabases.

indoorGIS
